dcterms:description: YelpChi compiles a collection of hotel and restaurant reviews from Yelp, in which nodes represent reviews. There are three kinds of relationship edges among these reviews.
dcterms:title: YelpChi

dcterms:creator: Julian John McAuley
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: The Amazon graph comprises reviews of products in the musical instruments category, in which nodes represent users, and the edges are the corresponding three kinds of relationships among reviews.
dcterms:title: Amazon

dcterms:description: FFSD is a private financial fraud semi-supervised dataset with partially labeled transaction records. It is used for credit card fraud detection.
dcterms:title: FFSD
